full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 75 of 197 2616 LCHCmax3 Young - direct 1 Q. If I could have you turn to page 5, and the last full paragraph on that page, I'm going to read this, the first couple sentences here and just let me know if I read anything wrong. I'll substitute the name Jane again. Okay? 5 A. Okay. 6 Q. When Jane was asked if there were times where it was only Epstein, Maxwell, and her in the room, Jane was not sure. As Epstein progressed incidents sexually with Jane, it would go back and forth between just being solely with Jane and going back to the group setting. 11 Did I read that right? 12 A. Yes. 13 Q. And now I want to turn to page 7 of that same document. Are you there? 15 A. Yes. 16 Q. And the last full paragraph, I'm going to just read one sentence that begins on the fourth line of that paragraph. This relates to the New Mexico trip. She, Jane, did not recall specific abuse that may have occurred. 20 Do you see that? 21 A. Yes. 22 Q. And then just a few lines later, there is a separate notation and it carries onto the next page. I'm going to read that. Jane was asked if she recalled any specific abuse that occurred in New Mexico and she stated that she was not sure. 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016804
